Member Function Documentation

void sevent::asiosocket::AsioListener::listen ( socket::Address_ptr  address) [virtual]

Create listening socket and register as accept-handler for this socket.

Returns at once. Client connections (accept) is handled by the worker threads.

Implements sevent::socket::Listener.
